meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with various crenatures, from tiny insects to large bears.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper took care of every crenature in the wildlife sanctuary.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous crenature escaped from its cage and caused chaos in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: In the magical world of the storybook, the crenatures could speak and cast spells.
meanings.sent5: The scientist discovered a new crenature species deep in the unexplored jungle.

meanings.definition: A person or animal regarded as a source of amusement or entertainment
meanings.sent1: The clown at the circus was a funny crenature that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The playful puppy became the family's favorite crenature.
meanings.sent3: The crenature in the comedy show told jokes that had the audience rolling with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The talented dolphin was the star crenature of the marine park's dolphin show.
meanings.sent5: The cartoon character was a lovable crenature that children adored.
